name: tasmoadmin
description: TasmoAdmin is a self-hosted administration panel for managing Tasmota-flashed IoT devices. It allows firmware updates, configuration, and monitoring from a centralized UI.

features.title: Device Discovery
features.description: Automatically discover Tasmota devices on your network for centralized management

features.title: Firmware Updates
features.description: Update firmware across multiple devices simultaneously from a single interface

features.title: Configuration Management
features.description: View and modify device configurations including WiFi, MQTT, and module settings

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor device status, uptime, and sensor readings in real-time from a unified dashboard

features.title: Bulk Operations
features.description: Perform actions on multiple devices at once for efficient fleet management

features.title: Command Execution
features.description: Send custom commands to devices individually or in groups for advanced control

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Save device configurations and restore them after firmware updates or device replacement

features.title: Device Grouping
features.description: Organize devices into groups for easier navigation and batch operations
